The claim stated that PM 2: 5 is the carrier of the Covid-19 virus and that the density of small particle air pollutants increases the severity and death rate of Covid-19 by 8-16.6%.
The claim referenced Assistant Professor: who explained the correlation between Covid-19 death rate and PM 2.5, citing examples from the US and the Netherlands.
Health experts have stated that there is: 5 increases the mortality rate of Covid-19. Dr. Rujikan Nasanit also clarified that her comments were misrepresented and that she obtained the information from an article by a professor from the University of Birmingham.
